name: Patience is never weakness, it's a gift
description: One thing I learned in life, You can be important to someone but not all the time. And always remember everything is possible if you believe in yourself. Have patience with all things but first of all with yourself.

name: Paradise should be everyone's dream
description: The world is not a place to live. No one can take anything away. Nothing will go with you without prayer. So everyone needs to pray. To look at your soul's other half is to know that paradise is a real thing.
